18.14.2 Fuel Temperature ▲: Maximum tank: 18.14.2 Fuel Temperature ▲: Tank fuel temperature prior to takeoff must not be less?
Tank fuel temperature prior to takeoff must not be less than -43°C or 3°C above the fuel freeze point, whichever is higher. Note: The use of fuel system icing inhibitor additives does not change the minimum fuel tank temperature limit.
